title: Sir Udanay  Lyrics Business Man Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Artist(s): Suchitra, Thaman. S
Song: Sir Udanay  
Lyricist: Na. Muthukumar

Movie: Businessman (2011)
Music: Thaman. S


Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Sir Udanay varuvaaraa
getha getha varuvaaraa
Thaambulam tharuvaaraa
vandha tharuvaarey   (2)

Uppu kaanam odhatula
mutham podanum
appadiye kanna moodi
sorgam poganum
Sir Udanay varuvaarey (2)

Korikaiyya aethukittu
seva seiyanum
Konji konji konjam konjam
enna kollanum....

Vathikuchiyaai suttu vidu aaha..
Ice kattiyaai thottu vidu aaha
Nee ambu vidum maara
saapu kottu viral
naan kaara oorugaa..

Sir Udanay varuvaaraa
getha getha varuvaaraa
Thaambulam tharuvaaraa
vandha tharuvaarey   (2)

Dhaagam iruku, thanni irukaa?
Un udhatua mudhal mazhai ennaka
nee naatu katta saraka

Idhu odamba, illai karumba
adha kadika vandhiruken erumba
Satham poda poda
poothadhenna arumba .. oh oh

Nee thottu thottu eduthuko aaha..
Enna serthu katti pidichuko aaha
Kodu thandhuvidu aaha
vendru vidu aaha
pala inbam aagaadhaa...

Sir Udanay varuvaarey
getha getha varuvaarey
Thaambulam tharuvaarey
vandha tharuvaarey   (2)

Sir Udanay varuvaaraa
getha getha varuvaaraa
Thaambulam tharuvaaraa
vandha tharuvaarey  		English Translation
I tried my best :)

Will he come now?,
will he come heroically.
Will he give our marriage invite?
He will give if he comes!!

I Need to kiss in the
Lips,
then go to heaven
closing the eyes
he will come now!!.

Need to accept all
the requests,
getting killed by being
lovable

Burn me like a match stick, aaha
Touch me like  ice cubes, aaha
You hit me like a bow
Touch me in a finger
I am a pickle

Will he come now?,
will he come heroically.
Will he give our marriage invite?
He will give if he comes!!

I am thirsty, is water there?
Is your lips first rain for me?
Are you a village alcohol?

Is it a body or sugarcane?
I came to eat you like an ant
Is it a flower blossomed
with noise? Oh oh..

just touch and take me ..aha
join by hugging me . aaha
give me give me .. aaha
win me .. aaha
won’t it be more joy ?

He will come now,
He will come heroically.
He will give your marriage invite
He will give if he comes

Will he come now?,
will he come heroically.
Will he give our marriage invite?
He will give if he comes!!
